title: Resurrected Jesus as the Revelation of our Future Selves
description:
The resurrection is often portrayed as a miraculous island in the middle of stagnant history. This is not how the Apostles saw it. The resurrection was a revelatory event that showed us the whole trajectory of our transformation in the middle of it. How it impacts morality is that we are admonished to begin living our destination now. 

1 Peter 1. 

Logos Made Flesh Conversation https://youtu.be/rAlmXRJt0u8

Jesus as the Black Swan https://youtu.be/v1Xc8lYCrRw
